collectible.title: Pit's Bottoms
collectible.subtitle: Pit's favorite pair of shorts.
collectible.text: Pit was in such a hurry to leave after his loss, he forgot these. Luckily, you were there to give them a new loving home. His scent lingers on them.

collectible.title: Palutena Bow
collectible.subtitle: Pit's signature weapon.
collectible.text: Painstakingly crafted by Palutena herself, this bow has seen its share of battles. Able to fire arrows of light or split into two short blades, this blessed bow is as reliable at combat as it is at covering modesty.
collectible.unlock: Play a game against Pit and Akko where Pit whips out his bow.
